parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a string containing shortcut text for menu item on the given path. <template><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>This command is currently broken in Arma 3 2.00. It only returns shortcuts which do not use a modifier key (CTRL, ALT and SHIFT).</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuShortcutText]] [idc, path]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuShortcutText]] path

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value>  [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <Code>[[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120 [[menuShortcutText]] [1, 8]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Returns "#"</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[menuShortcut]] [[menuSetShortcut]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
